Ashé Attire

A clothing brand established in 2015 by two high school students who set out to make a difference through t-shirts.



Embracing Diversity

Ashé Attire's clothing brings together patterns from all over the world, combining many different styles to create something that is greater than the sum of its parts. Ashé was looking for a website which would not only convey their message, but also showcase the diversity that they stood for. Leung Enterprises met with the founders of Ashé multiple times in order to realize this vision. Through the careful selection of images and typography, we built a website that is a genuine expression of diversity.


Visit Website  



Back to Portfolio


Ard, tell ya customers that you worked quickly and customized the site to exactly how we wanted it.

– Mohammed Rashid, CEO of Ashé Attire
